title: Status top bar wrong colour issues
body: # Bug Report Below are the cases when status top bar appears to have the wrong color ## Problem - [ ] 1) **IOS:** The system bar on "Jump To" is black: - [ ] 2) **Android (Gooogle Pixel7):** opening "Jump To" leads to a white google pixel panel on Activity centre (should be black): https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/4557972/e0be86a7-1d57-4fe4-aefc-9e1b6736e3f1 - [ ] 3) Wrong status top bar color when opening AC/Share screen after onboarding (Android 12, Samsung Galaxy A52) **Preconditions:** light mode is on on the device **Steps:** 1. Proceed with onboarding 2. Open Share/AC screen after onboarding 3. Close the screen 4. Pay attention at status top bar **Actual result:** status top bar color is wrong. After app reopening issue is not reproducible. https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/97245802/9347eb8f-cc4a-4526-8ecd-e9cc15208bdd - [ ] 4) Wrong status top bar color after switching device theme (Android 12, Samsung Galaxy A52) Might be global problem with theme changing. **Steps:** 1. Switch device theme while being logged in the account 2. Pay attention at status top bar **Actual result:** status top bar color is wrong. Status top bar color becomes correct after app re-opening. https://github.com/status-im/status-mobile/assets/97245802/176310d6-2ad9-4dc4-8085-634909ddd58a
